Course Objectives

 

By the end of this course, participants will be able to

  • Define self-regulated learning;
  • Identify the importance of helping students become self-regulated learners;
  • Describe instructional strategies for self-regulated learning;
  • Plan for incorporating self-regulated learning strategies into their adult education classes.

Course Expectations

You are expected to read and post at least once to the discussion forum (but not to each discussion thread) and to the journal; watch recorded presentations; read the background readings and resource pages of the course; and complete assignments and the final evaluation.

Note:There are several additional links and resources posted. Explore these to inform your practice, as you have time.
